Title: The Opalfront
Description:
I'm a city guard, not a soldier! But these people need our help!

There are too many nerubians for us to clear out. We can only keep this chokepoint and hope the miners make their way to us.

That one was too small. But you look like a fighter. Help us!
ObjectivesText: Kill Nerubian forces at the Opalcreg in the Isle of Dorn.
CompletionText: We will do what we can to help the miners escape.
RewardText: Thank you, outlander. You have given them a fighting chance.
